abstract: The Appraisal; homes on block in gentrified neighborhood of Boerum Hill, Brooklyn, have traditionally sold at lower prices than those on neighboring streets due to presence of two large public housing projects; recent buyers on street have found that traditional discount no longer holds.
snippet: Buyers no longer seem to be getting deep discounts on properties on a block in Boerum Hill that sits between two large public housing projects.
lead_paragraph: Buyers no longer seem to be getting deep discounts on properties on a block in Boerum Hill that sits between two large public housing projects.

headline.main: In Brooklyn, a Quaint Block and a Symbol of Blight
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, A Quaint Block And a Symbol of Blight
